properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bwana alipokwisha
kula pamoja,
na wafuasi wake
aliwaosha miguu.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bwana alipokwisha
kula pamoja
na wafuasi wake,
aliwaosha miguu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Akawaambia mwafahamu
niliyowatendea.
Mimi niliye Bwana
na mwalimu wenu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nimewapa mfano,
ili mtende nanyi vile vile.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Amini amini
nawaambia nyinyi
Mtumwa si mkuu
kuliko Bwana wake.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Wala mtume sio mkuu,
kuliko aliyempeleka.
